Educational App Development

Empowering learning experience with today’s top-notch technologies

  • User-friendly designs
  • Customized plan
  • Free expert consultation
  • Portfolio of various designs
  • 100 % data security
  • No extra and hidden charges
Free Consultations

Redefine the Academic Experience by Developing an Educational App

Providing education mobility solutions to cater to the needs of educational industries

Changing the learning methods from the traditional approach to smart e-learning approach. Ed-tech apps are an efficient way of learning through online video, audio or document files. E-learning has changed the way the students interact with the studies and learn from their home or outside the schools.

Educational app development services provide a pool of opportunities for educational industries to offers a wide spectrum of learning activities to their audience. We, at The NineHertz, believes in developing the best solutions for students to help them learn fast and brighten their future by implementing their knowledge.

Offering the Exquisite Educational App Development Solutions

We deliver the best in mobility solutions for the education industry and offer our solutions for kindergarten students to master course students.

Online Training Apps

Get guidance from subject experts at home and master your subject. Easy to learn, practice, and analyze your performance through user-friendly and content-rich apps.

eBook Learning

Make your learning experience seamless by reading through eBooks. We build easy navigation and mobile or tablet friendly designs.

Kids Fun Learning Apps

Interactive and visually rich apps for preschool to kindergarten to initiate their logical and reasoning thinking abilities. We develop fun and entertaining educational game apps for fun learning experience.

Professional Educational Apps

Advance apps specially designed for Engineering and Medical students for getting real-time solutions and practical learning. Supporting high-end tools associated with complex data like statistics, graphs, automation, etc.

E-Library App Solutions

Choose and read your favorite books from the e-library. With easy navigation, responsive designs and multiple platform support, you can enjoy reading in your leisure time or enhance your knowledge from a plethora of books.

Competitive Exam Apps

Enhance your skills and proficiency by giving real-time exam based on real exam patterns. Incorporating the latest technologies to enhance your performance and accuracy.
 

Our Eminent Services are for Everyone

Implanting personalize learning experience in students for boosting their outcomes

  • Student Engagement
  • Teaching Enhancement
  • Institution Infrastructure

Student Engagement

Creating highly-interactive apps to engage students in furnishing their knowledge with practicality and real-time tools. Our educational app developers incorporate high-end innovative apps for Edu Games, Memory Training, Language Learning, Comprehensive Learning, and advanced apps for engineering students. Developing apps for preschoolers to university students to bring the right information and enhance their subject knowledge.

  • Wide Range of eBooks of Diverse Subject Matters
  • Easy and Effective Digital Library Access
  • A system to Track Assignment
  • Real-Time Mock Tests and Performance Analysis System

Teaching Enhancement

For making teaching more interesting for your students, leverage the benefits of mobile solutions and connect with your students digitally. Complete your syllabus on-time by uploading your entire module online and guide your students with their queries on a real-time questionnaire system.

  • Advance and enhance eBooks
  • Statistics and Graphical Embedment
  • Custom Content Development like Mock Exam, Subject Content, etc.
  • Module Management System (Upload Videos, Audios, Images, and Manage Account)

Institution Infrastructure

Creating apps to manage the online fees management system, student database management system, learning programs, etc. We deliver best mobility services to the institutes to let them connect with the students for a scalable, potential and cost-effective experience.

  • Secure Fees Collection System
  • Observing and Managing Educational Resources
  • Transparency between Students and Management
  • Quality Assurance in Education System

Unique Features of Educational App Development

We are dealing with young minds who are going to drive our future, thus we take utmost care in accomplishing the needs of e-learning and mobile-based educational apps.

  • A real-time interactive messaging system to resolve every single query.
  • Add an unlimited number of course, audio, video lectures, etc.
  • Easy navigation system for a user-friendly experience.
  • Secure login for maintaining personal data of tutor, institute, and students.
  • Enhancing research and innovation abilities.
  • Efficient and effective content management.
  • Mock tests, exams and practice papers for enhancing the outcomes.
  • Multiple platform compatibility.

Choose Renowned Educational App Developement Company

The NineHertz is among the top educational app development companies, working towards embedding the latest technologies into the education system.

  • A real-time interactive messaging system to resolve every single query.
  • Add an unlimited number of course, audio, video lectures, etc.
  • Easy navigation system for a user-friendly experience.
  • Secure login for maintaining personal data of tutor, institute, and students.
  • Enhancing research and innovation abilities.
  • Efficient and effective content management.
  • Mock tests, exams and practice papers for enhancing the outcomes.
  • Multiple platform compatibility.
Free Consultations
